string-array.name: motivational_quotes
string-array.item: "Believe in yourself and all that you are."
"The only limit to our realization of tomorrow is our doubts of today.‚Äù

resources.string:
1. Wash your hands regularly with soap and water.
2. Maintain social distancing to avoid close contact with others.
3. Wear a mask in crowded places.
4. Avoid touching your face, especially your eyes, nose, and mouth.
5. Keep your environment clean and sanitized.

Common symptoms include:
1. Fever or chills
2. Cough
3. Shortness of breath or difficulty breathing
4. Fatigue
5. Muscle or body aches
6. Headache
7. New loss of taste or smell
8. Sore throat
9. Congestion or runny nose
10. Nausea or vomiting
11. Diarrhea

This application is designed to provide users with important health information regarding symptoms, precautions, and guidance related to various health topics. It aims to raise awareness and promote healthy practices among users. For more information, please consult healthcare professionals.
